wordGroup: to the hilt 最大限度地；完全地

sentences.en: We're mortgaged up to the hilt.
sentences.cn: 我们已经把什么都抵押了。

sentences.en: They have promised to back us to the hilt.
sentences.cn: 他们保证全力支持我们。

sentences.en: The men who wield the power are certainly backing him to the hilt.
sentences.cn: 那些掌权者当然都在全力支持他。
